member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager
member.summary: RadDockingManager enables docking on the page where it is placed.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.GetCurrentRadDockingManager(System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Gets the instance of the RadDockingManager placed on the specified page
member.returns: RadDockingManager instance if any; otherwise null.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.SaveState
member.summary: Returns a string that contains the current state of the RadDockingZones and RadDockableObjects.
member.returns: A string that contains the current state of the RadDockingZones and RadDockableObjects.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.LoadState(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the state of the RadDockingZones and RadDockableObjects from a string, that is previously created from call to RadDockingManager.SaveState().
member.param: A string that contains description of the RadDockingZones and RadDockableObjects state.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.DockEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the docking is enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.DockingZones
member.summary: Gets a list of all available RadDockingZones on the page

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.DockableObjects
member.summary: Gets a list of all available RadDockableObjects on the page

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.ShowContentWhileDragging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the contents of the RadDockableObject while dragging.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.ShowToolTipWhileDragging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show a tool tip with current top-left position or width/heigth of the RadDockableObject while dragging.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.Skin
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the skin used.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.SkinsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path to the Skin folder.
member.remarks: The ~ at the begining of the SkinPath denotes the application root path.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.EffectsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use animation effects for move, resize, etc.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.EffectsUpdateRate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the frequence of animated object updates per second (1-100).

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingManager.EffectsDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating duration of the animated effects.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags
member.summary: Specifies the different types of docking zones.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Top
member.summary: Top (horizontal) zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Bottom
member.summary: Bottom (horizontal) zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Left
member.summary: Left (vertical) zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Right
member.summary: Right (vertical) zone.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.All
member.summary: All types of zones.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneTypeFlags.Custom
member.summary: Custom zones, specified by ID. Applicable only to dockable objects.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneFixedSizeFlags
member.summary: Specifies whether a docking zone will resize according to the size of the docked objects inside it, or will retain its size and the docked object will accomodate their size to the zone's size.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneFixedSizeFlags.None
member.summary: Width, height of the docking zone are not fixed and will resize according to the docked objects.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneFixedSizeFlags.ByWidth
member.summary: The docking zone has fixed width and the objects will resize to fit in the zone without resizing it.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneFixedSizeFlags.ByHeight
member.summary: The docking zone has fixed height and the objects will resize to fit in the zone without resizing it.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneFixedSizeFlags.ByWidthHeight
member.summary: Both width and height of the zone are fixed.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList
member.summary: Represents a collection of RadDockingZones.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadDockingZoneList class.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.#ctor(Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadDockingZoneList class that contains elements copied from the specified RadDockingZoneList and that has the same initial capacity as the number of elements copied.
member.param: The RadDockingZoneList whose elements are copied to the new list.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.Add(Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZone)
member.summary: Adds an object to the end of the RadDockingZoneList.
member.param: The RadDockingZone to be added to the end of the RadDockingZoneList.
member.returns: The index at which the value has been added.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.Remove(Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZone)
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the RadDockingZoneList.
member.param: The Object to remove from the RadDockingZoneList.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.Contains(Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZone)
member.summary: Determines whether an element is in the RadDockingZoneList.
member.param: The RadDockingZone to locate in the RadDockingZoneList. The value can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: true if item is found in the RadDockingZoneList; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.IndexOf(Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZone)
member.summary: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a value in the RadDockingZoneList or in a portion of it.
member.param: The RadDockingZone to locate in the RadDockingZoneList. The value can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire RadDockingZoneList, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a value in the RadDockingZoneList or in a portion of it.
member.param: The id of a RadDockingZone to locate in the RadDockingZoneList. The value can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire RadDockingZoneList, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.OnValidate(System.Object)
member.summary: Performs additional custom processes when validating a value.
member.param: The object to validate.

member.summary: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDockingZoneList.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the RadDockingZone with the specified id.
